AbilityTooltips.earthshaker_fissure:
Great for interrupting a push, initiating, blocking an escape, or blocking an advance.

Take caution when using, don't block your team mates to their death, or prevent them from getting a kill.
AbilityTooltips.earthshaker_enchant_totem:
Enchants your totem allowing the next attack you deal to do extra damage, works against towers.

Can cause a stun for Aftershock, so great to use to force a small stun out.
AbilityTooltips.earthshaker_aftershock:
Causes your abilities to deal a bit of extra damage in an area around you, as well as causing a small stun.

Works great if you miss Fissure, or want to do a bit of extra damage if you cast it when an enemy is close enough to you, and adds some damage to Echo Slam.
AbilityTooltips.earthshaker_echo_slam:
Great blink in and use during team fights, the more units affected by this ability the more damage it will do.


Because of the way this ult works, it works well against Heroes such as: Broodmother, Phantom Lancer, and Natures Prophet.
